Package com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc

webMethods SAP Adapter IDoc Java API.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IDocConstants This interface contains any IDoc specific constants for use by the SAP Adapter IDoc Java API.
 

Class Summary
IDataDocument Class that represents an IDoc using IData to implement the IDocDocument interface.
IDataDocumentList Class that holds and manages a list of IDoc documents using IData to implement the IDocDocumentList interface.
IDataRecord Class that serves as a basic instance for accessing structured IDoc data elements using IData to implement the IDocRecord interface.
IDataSegment Class that represents a single IDoc segment using IData to implement the IDocSegment interface.
IDocDocumentList Class that holds and manages a list of IDoc documents using JCoIDocDocumentList to implement the IDocDocumentList interface.
 

Package com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc Description

webMethods SAP Adapter IDoc Java API.

Provides the classes necessary to create an IDoc list on the SAP Adapter and the classes needed to handle an IDoc list received from a SAP system that might get transfered to another SAP Adapter.

This package basically provides an SAP Adapter specific implementation of the SAP IDoc Class Library interfaces plus an wrapper over the JCoIDoc implementation that comes with the SAP IDoc Class library.

Since:
7.1
